thread.title: BRIEF-Cast H1 net loss shrinks slightly to 2.5 mln euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Cast H1 net loss shrinks slightly to 2.5 mln euros | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Cast H1 net loss shrinks slightly to 2.5 mln euros
text:
Sept 1 Cast SA :
* H1 operating loss of 2.4 million euros ($2.7 million) versus loss of 2.9 million euros a year ago
* H1 net loss 2.5 million euros versus loss of 2.6 million euros a year ago
* Confirms annual objectives, i.e. growth of over 10 pct and a profit
Source text: bit.ly/1FgyEbc Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8881 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom)
